name: Tap the Pig
description:
Warning! this game is addictive, once you start you can't stop!

Tap on the screen to make your pig fly (yes! pigs fly!). Dodge any obstacles that get in your way. The further you go, the higher your score! Try and beat your friends!

FEATURES
► Compete with your friends using Game Center Leaderboard
► Get a notification when you overtake your Game Center friends!
► Share your score in Facebook and Twitter
► Casual game, easy to use
► Polished design
► Retina Support
► Universal App
